column4: how do i upgrade my kernel from 2.6.32-32-generic to 2.6.33?  i'm running meerkat maverick
read the manual, come back if you have specific questions ... believe me that's a loaded question

my specific question is that when i run sudo make install on a new kernel, is it supposed to produce a initrd image?  my impression was that yes, make install creates an initrd image, but i can't find it under /boot
so my specific question is, does make install create an initrd image?
